entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
